definitions: in a forceful or heartfelt way; firmly

examples.text: the rebel movement strongly denied responsibility for the attack
I strongly believed in the importance of what I did

definitions: to a great degree or extent

examples.text: he was strongly affected by the divorce of his parents
I was strongly impressed by his enthusiasm

definitions: in a very intense or distinctive manner

examples.text: the car smelled strongly of whiskey

shortDefinitions: in very intense or distinctive manner

definitions: in a way that is able to withstand force or wear
shortDefinitions: in way that is able to withstand force or wear
